title: Stylized Tiger Mount
description: Stylized RPG animal mount/character with lots of options for customization for your RPG, MOBA, or MMO
longDescription:
Join the N-hance Studio community on: Discord and Facebook


_____________________________________________________________________________


Attention:

In case of usage of our assets (including this one) in NFT / Blockchain projects - we recommend to contact us via e-mail!

_____________________________________________________________________________



Asset Description:

Various color materials and Modular Parts for ultimately wide color customization included!


PREVIEWS

Video Preview


PBR Stylized Material: 

  • 10 Handpainted Diffuse Maps
  • 2 Roughness Maps
  • 1 Emissive Map
  • 2 Normal Maps


Choose between different styles:

  • Blue Tiger Mount
  • Gold Tiger Mount
  • Purple Tiger Mount
  • Metal Tiger Mount
  • Wild Blue Tiger
  • Wild Gold Tiger
  • Wild Purple TIger
  • Wild Metal Tiger

Bonus Skins:

  • Blue Undead Tiger
  • Green Undead Tiger
  • Grey Undead Tiger


Create your own style with:

  • 7 Colors for Body
  • 3 Colors for Armor
  • 2 Modular Parts (Armored and Rideable Tiger)
